title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 92-1.3 - Provider competency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 92-1.3 - Provider competency

State Regulations

Persons or organizations seeking approval, other than DOH regulated health care facilities, including home health care agencies, shall document their expertise and competence to communicate the course materials and document that course work or training shall be supported by adequate facilities, equipment and other physical resources. Such facilities and agencies are deemed competent to provide training and education on infection control, unless they are subject to a denial or termination as provided for in section
92-1.5
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
92-1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
